select distinct sm.id as id,sm.path as path,sm.name as name,sm.component as component, sm.meta_title as meta_title,sm.meta_icon as meta_icon,sm.redirect as redirect, sm.sort as sort,sm.enabled as enabled,sm.parent_id as parent_id from sys_menu sm left join sys_menu csm on csm.parent_id = sm.id where sm.deleted = 0
and sm.id in (select menu_id from sys_menu_role where role_id = #{queryMenu.roleId})

select distinct sm.id as id,sm.path as path,sm.name as name,sm.component as component, sm.meta_title as meta_title,sm.meta_icon as meta_icon,sm.redirect as redirect, sm.sort as sort,sm.enabled as enabled,sm.parent_id as parent_id from sys_menu sm left join sys_menu_role smr on smr.menu_id = sm.id where sm.deleted = 0 and sm.enabled = 1
and sm.parent_id = #{parentId}
and sm.parent_id = 0
and smr.role_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId})
order by sm.sort

select `id` as id,`path` as path,`name` as name,`component` as component,`meta_title` as meta_title, `meta_icon` as meta_icon,`redirect` as redirect,`sort` as sort,`enabled` as enabled,`parent_id` as parent_id from sys_menu where deleted = 1
and path like concat('%', #{queryMenu.path}, '%')
and name like concat('%', #{queryMenu.name}, '%')
and component like concat('%', #{queryMenu.component}, '%')
and meta_title like concat('%', #{queryMenu.metaTitle}, '%')
and meta_icon like concat('%', #{queryMenu.metaIcon}, '%')
and redirect like concat('%', #{queryMenu.redirect}, '%')
and enabled = #{queryMenu.enabled}
and parent_id = #{queryMenu.parentId}
and id in (select menu_id from sys_menu_role where role_id = #{queryMenu.roleId})
